thread.title: Jill Oxnard
thread.title_full: Glasses Direct reviewed by Jill Oxnard

author: Jill Oxnard
title: Jill Oxnard
text: The service I received from glasses direct was great. When my two pairs of glasses arrived the prescription for right side was wrong (this could of been me in a rush) but I sent them back in the freepost envelope with the alterations and with no questions or quibbles they changed the lens to the correct prescription at no cost to me. I was kept informed via email all the way on the progress of the glasses. The glasses themselves Are great easily what you'd pay considerably more for on the high street and I got two pairs for the price of one.
